title: Alfredbolk
author: Alfredbolk
content: Free Unlimited Virtual and Physical VISA Cards_______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________WEBSITE _______________________________________________________________________________ ___________________ABOUT PLATOO BUSINESSPlatoo offers sole traders and companies the ability to instantly create FREE virtual and physical VISA cards for staff, employees and clients worldwide.LEARN MORE LEARN MORE WEBSITE

comments.author: ADAM Alams
comments.body: I am interested to use your platform. Can you please guide me how can I create my account?

comments.body: How many cards I can create? Is there any limit?

comments.body: i need them a lot daily if any supplier pm me for rates

Can I open platoo business account without uk company?

comments.body: Can I open personal account on platoo.business using my passport and Can I apply for physical card?

comments.author: ADAM Alams
comments.body: I just created my account but it's not verified yet. Can you please tell me how many days need to get approval?

comments.author: atmia_tr
comments.body: Platoo.Business - Free Unlimited Virtual and Physical VISA Cards. ATM card work in Malaysia, Indonesia and Taiwan very well....

comments.body: Country wise charges are different  Platoo.Business Charge me £18 so is worth it...

comments.author: kamin_bandu
comments.body: this credit work anywhere like cloud platform digital cean, vultr, linode etc  Platoo.business Yeah cards are UK/USA and free, just issued some to Turkey

comments.body: Exchange for top-up making good rates. Black market is truly finished!. Can we use everywhere platoo.business visa card??

comments.body: Do you ship visa card everywhere in the world?

comments.author: Dra_Shay
comments.body: Physical card also available Platoo.Business   I top in local currency then with in USD....

comments.author: mine_beauty
comments.body: How does Platoo.business ensure the security of the virtual and physical VISA cards it offers for staff, employees, and clients worldwide?

comments.body: What are the fees associated with the Unlimited Virtual and Physical VISA Card?

comments.author: Abusadaoxes
comments.body: How do I load funds onto the Unlimited Virtual and Physical VISA Card?

comments.author: Alfredbolk
comments.body: Quote from: ADAM Alams on March 01, 2023, 07:01:02 PMI am interested to use your platform. Can you please guide me how can I create my account?Sure, go to https://login.platoo.business/Identity/Account/Register

comments.author: Alfredbolk
comments.body: Quote from: FrederickDawson on March 02, 2023, 04:58:10 PMHow many cards I can create? Is there any limit?You can create free unlimited virtual an physical cards, after you’ve completed registration.

comments.author: Kingsagar
comments.body: I  topped by transfer it says instant, but took 3 hours to arrive. Slow but works.

comments.author: ADAM Alams
comments.body: Ordered 2 physical cards they arrived with my logo and works for my clients in India. Very impressive
